title: UK PM announces Plan B measures in England
content: Boris Johnson announces tougher Plan B measures to combat the Omicron variant and allow time for more boosters, including Covid passes for large venues.

title: UK PM announces Plan B measures in England
content: Boris Johnson announces tougher Plan B measures to combat the Omicron variant and allow time for more boosters, including Covid passes for large venues.

title: Pfizer says booster shot promising against Omicron
content: The company says a third dose of its vaccine could improve protection against the new variant.

title: India's top general dies in helicopter crash
content: General Bipin Rawat was killed alongside his wife and 11 others in the crash in Tamil Nadu.

title: Scholz becomes German leader as Merkel bows out
content: Olaf Scholz is sworn in as chancellor, leading a three-party coalition after 16 years of Merkel rule.

title: Girlsâ€™ despair as Taliban confirm Afghan school ban
content: The BBC hears about the ban's harmful impact from teachers and students in 13 Afghan provinces.

title: Finnish PM sorry for clubbing after Covid contact
content: Sanna Marin went on a night out on Saturday, hours after her foreign minister had tested positive.

title: Sending US troops to Ukraine not on table - Biden
content: The US president says a Western response to a Russian invasion would not include boots on the ground.

title: UK joins diplomatic boycott of China Winter Olympics
content: Prime Minister Boris Johnson says no ministers will attend the games, citing human rights abuses.

title: France releases Saudi held over Khashoggi murder
content: A man with the same name as a suspect in the killing was arrested at a Paris airport on Tuesday.

title: Lecturers in court over sex for grades in Morocco
content: They are charged with incitement to debauchery, gender discrimination and violence against women.

title: Comedian Nick Cannon announces death of young son
content: The American's five-month-old son Zen died after having had a brain tumour, he said on his show.

title: Comedian Nick Cannon announces death of young son
content: The American's five-month-old son Zen died after having had a brain tumour, he said on his show.

title: Confederate general statue to be turned into art
content: The statue was at the centre of a white nationalist rally in 2017, which led to the death of a woman.

title: Boss says sorry for 'blundered' mass Zoom firing
content: Vishal Garg says he "is deeply sorry" for sacking 900 staff in an online meeting.

title: Japanese billionaire blasts off to play golf in space
content: Yusaku Maezawa will spend 12 days at the International Space Station before returning to Earth.

title: Former Afghan child refugee - now a top lawyer
content: The latest global news, sport, weather and documentaries
